Title: Love Punjab
Writer: Amberdeep Singh (dialogue), Amberdeep Singh (story), Amberdeep Singh
Actors: Amrinder Gill, Sargun Mehta Dubey, Manvir Johal, Yograj Singh
Plot: The story of Love Punjab revolves around a family in which husband and wife fights daily for small reasons and their son is only victim of these fights. After suffering from all these ...
